name: Mohamed Idris M
roleDescription: Experienced Web Developer in the information technology and services based industry. Strong professional skilled in JavaScript, React Js, Redux, Hooks, & PHP.
aboutme: I am currently working in Cognizant Technology Solutions, as Associate (Senior UI Developer). I am a self-taught Developer with nearly 5 years of experience in Web Applications and having skills in JavaScript, React Js, Hooks, Redux, HTML5, CSS & PHP.
skillsDescription: Strong professional skilled in JavaScript, React JS, Redux, PHP, SQL, jQuery and Responsive Web Development with Bootstrap.

portfolio.name: Verizon
portfolio.description: Verizon is an American wireless network operator that previously operated as a separate division of Verizon Communications under the name Verizon Wireless.

Participate in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on coding and debugging.
Analyze user requirements to define business objectives
Identify and resolve any technical issues arising
Write well designed, testable code
Build reusable code and libraries for future use

portfolio.name: iGoalZero
portfolio.description:
iGoalZero solution captures Job Safety Analysis(JSA), Work Permit
        image and data for work performed by contractors and employees without changing
        the current work process. This tool enhances the engagement of workers in the
        safety program. This tool provides the real time data for safety management and
        maximizes the impact of limited safety resources
responsiblities: Developed web pages using HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript ,TypeScript ,React.js and Redux
Customized the components using Typescript to fit into the requirements
Developed various reusable components that can be used across the application.
Developed web pages to fit into different screen resolutions.
Worked on developing form field validation
Interacted with clients to understand their requirements and developed the site accordingly
Worked on writing queries using GraphQL to access or update data into the database
Used Media Queries for the design to be compatible in all devices
